text: Thiago Vecino Berriel (born 25 February 1999) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a forward for Uruguayan Primera División club Nacional. ==Career== An academy graduate of Nacional, Vecino played an important part in his team's triumph in 2018 U-20 Copa Libertadores. He scored 3 goals from 5 matches in the tournament, including a brace against Sport Huancayo. Vecino made his professional debut on 17 August 2019, in a 1–1 draw against River Plate Montevideo.
